name: Neutron Coin
description: Neutron Coin (NTRN) is a Long-Term, Original SHA256d Proof-of-Stake Coin with Masternode Technology since 2015. Simply Stake or host a Masternode for a Steady, Passive ROI Neutron Coin is an open source wallet aimed at increasing a holders BTC Value over time with POS Features. Now under New Management with Active members and Full community support. The Neutron Network is solid and will be maintained for the foreseeable future. Support the network by running a Nucleus Node and earn coins for your efforts!
